weather_report:
As daybreak unveils itself over Downtown San Francisco, a subtle warmth mingles with the coastal air. A forecast of mostly sunny skies holds true, yet the afternoon promises a gentle decline in temperature. Presently, the city holds an enchanting clarity, the horizon framed by the sturdy outlines of iconic architecture softened by a whisper of the marine layer that hovers over the Golden Gate. The light southwest wind stirs at a brisk pace, offering a cool companion to the day, while the sun dances teasingly at the edge of the clouds, daring them to hang in just long enough to create an ethereal play of light.

As evening approaches, the clouds will begin to unfurl, cloaking the city in a soft embrace as they drift seamlessly across the sky, suggesting a cozy ambiance for later hours. An outfit that combines light layers—perhaps a breathable long-sleeve with a cardigan or light jacket—will provide the comfort one seeks against winding breezes. Taking a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, finding a quiet café to enjoy a cup of something warm, or exploring outdoor art installations would be ideal pursuits for today. The charm of this weather invites a confluence of indoor coziness and outdoor exploration, perfect for a Saturday filled with serene discovery.
